member.name: CONNECTDLGSTRUCTA
member.summary: TheCONNECTDLGSTRUCT structure is used by the function to establish browsing dialog box parameters.

member.name: CONNECTDLGSTRUCTA.cbStructure
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of theCONNECTDLGSTRUCT structure. The caller must supply this value.

member.name: CONNECTDLGSTRUCTA.hwndOwner
member.summary: The handle to the owner window for the dialog box.

summary.para: If the lpRemoteName member ofNETRESOURCE is specified, it will be entered into the path field of the dialog box. With the exception of the dwType member, all other members of theNETRESOURCE structure must be set to NULL. The dwType member must be equal to RESOURCETYPE_DISK.
The system does not support the RESOURCETYPE_PRINT flag for browsing and connecting to print resources.
A set of bit flags that describe options for the dialog box display. This member can be a combination of the following values.

listheader.description: The account is a user account.

Display a read-only path instead of allowing the user to type in a path.
This flag should be set only if the lpRemoteName member of the structure pointed to by lpConnRes member is not NULL (or an empty string), and the CONNDLG_USE_MRU flag is not set.
Enter the most recently used paths into the combination box. Set this value to simulate the function.
Show the check box allowing the user to restore the connection at logon.
Do not restore the connection at logon.

summary.para: For more information, see the following Remarks section.

member.name: CONNECTDLGSTRUCTA.dwDevNum
member.summary: If the call to the function is successful, this member returns the number of the connected device. The value is 1 for A:, 2 for B:, 3 for C:, and so on. If the user made a deviceless connection, the value is –1.

Do not restore the connection at logon.

member.name: CONNECTDLGSTRUCTA.dwDevNum
member.summary: If the call to the function is successful, this member returns the number of the connected device. The value is 1 for A:, 2 for B:, 3 for C:, and so on. If the user made a deviceless connection, the value is –1.
